author: pmuellr
msg: - changed how the highlighting is hidden/shown; was adding/removing
the highlighting divs from the document, but that was dumb; now
- simplified the identification in NodeStore of the highlighting
divs so they aren't sent by the client - was keeping track of
the parent div, and doing identity check, now just checking
for a property on the element.
- drive-by fix to add a thin border to the highlighting divs so
they stand out a bit more

author: pmuellr
msg: Added meta element to enable GCF. Closes #17
Also drive-by fix to add a short-cut icon.  Somehow that got removed
